roleset.name: become thick and leathery as a result of rubbing or scratching, become thick and leathery
roleset.note: LICHENIFY-V NOTES: Based on medical QA corpus (Framed by Anwen 07/19/10) (from lichenify.101-v)
LICHENIFICATION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison lichenify.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from lichenification.01-n)

roles.note: I don't think arg 0 is possible. However it is equally implausible in the verb sense and is present it that frame. (from lichenification.01-n)

example.text: Dr. Mary treated the lichenified, thickened skin on the patient's feet.
